title: BIG Reactions and BIG Upsets from the BIG Ten
description:
Wendi Nix, Greg McElroy and Joey Galloway discuss Trevor Lawrence teetering on whether or not to stay another year at Clemson, reactions to Big Ten season opener results, Wisconsin's COVID situation, and Jaylen Waddle's season ending injury.

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live Crew talks about their reactions to Week 1 for the Big Ten
